title: Ticket #6651: Late materialization should support max_idle like dagman does
description:
Late materialization should have a way to limit the number of materialized jobs so that new jobs are materialized when jobs start running. This should be the equivalent of DAGMAN's max idle. It should count non-running jobs, and allow new jobs to materialize when the count of non-running jobs is below a threshhold.

This will be controlled by an attribute in the cluster ad JobMaterializeMaxIdle and a submit keyword materialize_max_idle. Which, if it exists, should evaluate to an integer value that is the number of non-running jobs to materialize. non-running jobs will be the sum of jobs in IDLE state and in HELD state.
